about:
I am a final year undergraduate at the Singapore University of Technology and Design, pursuing a degree in Engineering Systems and Design with a dual focus tracks in Business Analytics and Operations Research, Supply Chain and Logistics.!


I aspire to make use of my analytical skills and ability to adapt and think creatively to provide data driven business solutions for companies.


Growing up in Australia and China, I got to appreciate and learn about the nuances of different cultures as well as the delicious food from different places. In my free time, I mostly work out and practice martial arts, otherwise you will find me curling up as a coach potato watching old movies.
